We've handcrafted your next scavenger hunt adventure

Let's Roam offers a diverse range of scavenger hunt experiences to suit every occasion and interest. Choose from city exploration, bar crawls, ghost tours, art walks, date night packages, and more. We're always adding new adventures to keep your curiosity ignited.

Custom events: an adventure that's all about your group

Our expert event planners are here to help you coordinate and host your event, whether it's for a few people or a few thousand! Your get-together is about to get WAY more exciting.

Team Building Activities

Provide your team with unique and intimate atmospheres where employees can build relationships that extend beyond the workplace.

Bachelorette Party Scavenger Hunt

Leave your wedding planning woes at the door and get ready to host the bachelorette party of your dreams!

Birthday Party Scavenger Hunt

Let's Roam has your back with an app-guided birthday party scavenger hunt that's a breeze to plan and comes with top-notch support.

Trusted by thousands of happy explorers

Don't just take our word for it! See what our satisfied adventurers have to say about their unforgettable experiences with Let's Roam.

This was so much fun!!! My husband and I had a great time exploring. A great way to spend a day. Highly recommended!!

Carol Hild

Had so much fun today with my team spice girls for Laura Bachelorette party

Pam Fox

Easy and fun adventure. Good way to tour the city

Scot Branham

Super fun! Great team building for a great company function

Maggie Silliman

Lots of fun, and a great activity with a group! We took the light rail down for some extra adventure. We learned a few fun facts.

Terri Hensen

So much fun and not pricey at all. Did it with a group including kids. They had fun too. We will for sure do more hunts in the future.

Tania Paddock

It was good family fun. Great that you can pause to have lunch etc. was fairly easy but didnt initially realise clues had time limits - hence missed out! Would definitely do another elsewhere.

Joanne Clements

Had lots of fun. Would definitely recommend this as a fun day.

Megan Prenc

Great time with family and friends would definitely do another tour!

Mike Vigil

Had an enjoyable time and visited a place I've not been before.

Stephanie Yencer

Awesome fun! You should try this. Great competition.

Ben Rathbone

Super fun experience reconnecting with my city and work team!

Sabrina Foster

Awesome way to learn more about our beautiful city! Great date night!

Laura Taylor

SO Fun!! Its a great team bonding experience & fun to learn about the town youre in. And an added bonus of exercise!

Monica Thomas

Thats a fun way to see the city and its history!

Howard Usher

Awesome game -it rocked!!

James Macie

Loved it! Great experience and challenging as well. Highly recommend!

Aaron Doman
